name: War Thunder - US Combined Forces
detailed_description:
Note! You can purchase only 1 Pack of the same value to 1 War Thunder account. Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

This Pack includes:

  • George Bostwick's P-47M-1-RE (Rank 4 USA);
  • M18 'Black Cat' (Rank 3 USA);
  • 1000 Golden Eagles.

All premium vehicles allow you to earn increased Research Points and Silver Lions for each battle and comes furnished with all available modifications.

Attention! Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN-account.
about_the_game:
Note! You can purchase only 1 Pack of the same value to 1 War Thunder account. Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

This Pack includes:

  • George Bostwick's P-47M-1-RE (Rank 4 USA);
  • M18 'Black Cat' (Rank 3 USA);
  • 1000 Golden Eagles.

All premium vehicles allow you to earn increased Research Points and Silver Lions for each battle and comes furnished with all available modifications.

Attention! Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN-account.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish*, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Czech*, Turkish*, Portuguese, Korean, Portuguese-Brazil, Hungarian, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor:2,2 GHz
  • Memory:2 GB (Windows XP), 4GB (Windows Vista/7/8/10)
  • Graphics:Intel HD Graphics 4000 / AMD Radeon 46XX / NVIDIA GeForce GT 520
  • Hard Drive:6.5 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7 64bit / 8 64bit / 10 64bit
  • Processor:Intel Core i5
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or higher, AMD Radeon series 77XX or higher
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Sierra 10.12
  • Processor:Dual-Core 2.4 GHz (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Intel 4000 HD/Radeon HD 5550/GeForce 8800
  • Hard Drive:6.5 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Sierra 10.12
  • Processor:Intel Core i7 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce GTX 680M or higher
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Most modern 64bit Linux distributions, SteamOS
  • Processor:Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia 660 with latest drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD
  • Hard Drive:6.5 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Ubuntu 14.04 64bit, SteamOS
  • Processor:Intel Core i7
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 660+ or similar AMD
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
